name: Zf2-pagination
body:
INSTALLATION 
Install as your own module and add 'Apps' to your application.config.php

cd to your module directory

Then run  git clone https://github.com/majormukoro/pagination  from command line

It would install it in your module directory

Finally change the name of the folder from pagination to Apps and access the view file through your browser
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
